::Battera::

She looked at him,"Vulios, please pot the weapon down.  You came here 
of your own free will and asked me to give you the info transfere on 
your past."  She looked at him with a rising fear in her eyes, she 
wonderd if he would shoot her or not.


KitKat::
"Calm down Starscream.  Now listen. Destructor is with DarkMouse. I 
have finished talking with Aracnia.  I have my suspisions as well, 
but for now, we have other things to deal with."  she looked at the 
computer. "I need to see if we can add an ace in our deck.  Would you 
be so kind as to get me Megatron's spark from over there," she 
pointed to the other counter," I will need that to make the clone 
from that spark.  I have a huntch that if I can make a good clone of 
Megatron, then we will have the upper hand later on."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois woke up to see Battera staring at him. He remembered her 
from 
> the base, and remembered he hit her. He looked around and saw they 
> were in a cave, and wondered how he got here. He pulled out his gun 
> and stuck it to her head.
> 
> "Where did you take me, filth?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream tracked down KitKat and walked into the DNA room, 
needing 
> to speak with her.
> 
> "Listen KitKat, Arachnia is a fraud. You have to be carefull with 
> this. I was talking to that mouse. When we found her, she was 
talking 
> to Inferno. Now Inferno works for Megatron. But he told her to go 
and 
> join Black Arachnia. Now why would Inferno tell a bot to join the 
> enenmy? He wouldn't. He would tell a bot to join a group that had a 
> treaty with Megatron. What if Black Arachnia really serves 
Megatron, 
> and wants him to rule all Predacons? What if she's only joining us 
to 
> send info on our decisions back to Megatron? Even worse, now that 
> you've made the council, she could make sure we make the wrong 
> decisions and fall into Megatrons trap? What if she costs us our 
> freedom?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> Brix and Fliq watched the Ark be destroyed, all of their work with 
it.
> 
> "No..." said Brix, "Not now. Not after all that trouble going to 
the 
> moon, Fliq almost dying, me killing Gekkidama to get those parts, 
ALL 
> FOR NOTHING! NO!!!!!" Suddenly a large spark exploded in Brix's 
head. 
> The extreme rage he experienced brought his other persona, Bronco, 
to 
> a new level. It took control of everything, and wouldn't even let 
> Brix stay in the back. Brix slowly fell into the depths of the sub-
> consious, and died. Only Bronco remained, and now that he had full 
> control, he could do what he wanted. Execpt it caused his own 
demise.
> In his deranged state, he whipped his launcher around. When it was 
> pointed at his feet, he fired, killing him instantly, and sending 
> Fliq flying. Fliq crawled back to the lifeless body.
> 
> "Brix....no"
> 
> Fliq began to weep.
> 
> (When they came back from the moon, I kept thinking what new 
> storyline I coud give them. I've been wanting to bring in a new 
char, 
> but I wanted to even it out by killing one too. So now Brix is 
dead, 
> and Fliq's story is the whole depression thing. He may even end up 
> turning on the Maximals.)
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Tamron took most of the shots, tiny pockets of mech fluid started 
to 
> seep through. He saw the great light rise in the sky, and knew it 
> easily. He thought to himself:
> 
> Ultra Magnus. What a surprise! But there's no way we can stay here. 
> There are too many opponents. But in destroying the Ark, we have 
been 
> given an ace, and we will store it in our sleeve. As I have long 
> suspected, Spears has been held at another Maximal Base. We will 
> monitor these Maximals, and when they send a representitive to the 
> base, we will track it's course and know where Spears is being held.
> 
> He called out loud:
> 
> "Slayer! Savage! Return to base! New plan!"
> 
> Tamron and Savage took off for the Trainer base.
